questions.question: Which species is known as the skilled human?
questions.answer: Homo habilis

questions.question: What does the word 'habilis' mean?
questions.answer: Skilled

questions.question: Homo habilis mainly used tools for
questions.answer: Scraping and cutting

questions.question: Which species stood fully erect?
questions.answer: Homo erectus

questions.question: Which discovery helped Homo erectus survive cold climate?
questions.answer: Fire

questions.question: Who made hand-axes?
questions.answer: Homo erectus

questions.question: Neanderthals were named after a place in
questions.answer: Germany

questions.question: Neanderthals mainly lived in
questions.answer: Caves

questions.question: Which human species buried their dead with rituals?
questions.answer: Neanderthals

questions.question: Which species is also called Cro-Magnon man?
questions.answer: Homo sapiens

questions.question: Which species had a well-developed language?
questions.answer: Homo sapiens

questions.question: Modern humans are known as
questions.answer: Homo sapiens sapiens

questions.question: What science studies heredity?
questions.answer: Genetics

questions.question: Which development led to settled life?
questions.answer: Agriculture

questions.question: Which food component increased after farming?
questions.answer: Carbohydrates

questions.question: Which species is known as the skilled human?
questions.answer: Homo habilis

questions.question: What does the word 'habilis' mean?
questions.answer: Skilled

questions.question: Homo habilis mainly used tools for
questions.answer: Scraping and cutting

questions.question: Which species stood fully erect?
questions.answer: Homo erectus

questions.question: Which discovery helped Homo erectus survive cold climate?
questions.answer: Fire

questions.question: Who were Homo habilis?
questions.answer: Homo habilis were skilled humans who used their hands to make tools.

questions.question: Why is Homo habilis called skilled human?
questions.answer: Because they used their hands skillfully to make tools.

questions.question: What kind of tools did Homo habilis use?
questions.answer: They used simple stone tools for scraping and cutting.

questions.question: Who was Homo erectus?
questions.answer: Homo erectus was a human species that stood erect.

questions.question: How did Homo erectus use fire?
questions.answer: They used fire for warmth and protection.

questions.question: What tools did Homo erectus make?
questions.answer: They made hand-axes and symmetrical tools.

questions.question: Who were Neanderthals?
questions.answer: Neanderthals were strong humans who lived in caves.

questions.question: What weapons did Neanderthals use?
questions.answer: They used spears, axes and scrapers.

questions.question: What shows Neanderthals had rituals?
questions.answer: They buried their dead with tools and ochre.

questions.question: Why did Neanderthals become extinct?
questions.answer: They could not adapt to environmental changes.

questions.question: Who were Homo sapiens?
questions.answer: Homo sapiens were intelligent humans with developed language.

questions.question: What is Cro-Magnon man?
questions.answer: Cro-Magnon man is Homo sapiens found in Europe.

questions.question: Why is language important in evolution?
questions.answer: It helped humans communicate and cooperate.

questions.question: What is heredity?
questions.answer: Passing of traits from parents to children is heredity.

questions.question: What is genetics?
questions.answer: Genetics is the science that studies heredity.

questions.question: Who are modern humans?
questions.answer: Modern humans are Homo sapiens sapiens.

questions.question: What led humans to settle in one place?
questions.answer: Agriculture led humans to settle.

questions.question: What changes occurred due to farming?
questions.answer: Food production increased and life became settled.

questions.question: What is civilization?
questions.answer: Civilization is a developed way of human life.

questions.question: Why is Homo sapiens sapiens called thinking man?
questions.answer: Because of high intellectual and cultural abilities.
